Html:
Hi,

I want to know whether the codeplex wpf datagrid supports for virtual mode?

Thanks!

Yes it supports.

Simply I have to set 

<font size="2" color="#ff0000"><font size="2" color="#ff0000">

VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing

</font></font><font size="2" color="#ff0000">

 

</font>

= "True" 

VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode="Recycling"

Hi charith,

The DataGrid only support UI virtualization but not the Data virtualization in this moment. UI virtualization is not exactly the same as WinForm virutual mode.

Hi,

Can you please tell me what's the difference between those two virtualization?

Thanks,

Charith

Hi,

The links below have talked about what is the difference between two virtualization:

http://blogs.microsoft.co.il/blogs/tomershamam/archive/2009/09/06/ui-virtualization-vs-data-virtualization.aspx

http://blogs.microsoft.co.il/blogs/tomershamam/archive/2009/10/01/ui-virtualization-vs-data-virtualization-part-2.aspx?CommentPosted=true#commentmessage

Hopes can help you!

Tony
